list_ex_of_english: From noon to 6 pm, a free outdoor concert is held every hour.
Most of her conversations took place around noon, at the communal meal.
He spent the better part of the after noon tuning the piano.
Shortly after noon, the batteries in the scanning machine failed and the registration process stopped.
Although he starts work again at noon time, he has to return to the restaurant at about eleven in the morning and get everything prepared.
There it is on the monitor + their plane arrives at noon.
Participants whose classes continue beyond noon must therefore come directly from school.
I was sitting at my desk on a dark winter after noon, reading an article about adolescent delinquency.
